properties.Name_of_Sp: Ambagasthenna spring at Pitakanda Pathana area
properties.Observatio: Although a well-developed water project is being implemented by the Pradeshiya sabha using this water source, there is no water filtering system.
properties.Descriptio:
Install a water treatment system

Water Meter and Intall the meter

Chain link mesh fence 2.0m high (Gauge 12)with 48mm outer Dia. 2.3mm tk. GI pipe at 2.9m c/c uprights and 21mm Outer Dia. 1.8mm tk. GI vertical centre bracing. 48mm Outer Dia. 2.3mm tk.

properties.Observatio: This area may be about  2 acres of which about 60% are large trees, and is being illegally acquired because there are no boundaries. There are many springs.
properties.Descriptio:
Vegetative cover improving around the water source with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interval
